resources.string:
All measurements are in Feet and Inches within the slider calculator.
 Width is in feet and half feet (6 inches),
 Height is in Inches and half inches,
 Slope is in Percent and tenths

This tool rounds down to the nearest 1/4 inch.
 The result is a slightly steeper slope. If the Hub depth number is below zero (negative) it will turn red, 
 as an indicator that additional lift is needed. typically we use 6 inch jacks,
 so the lift will then be for instance, 2 inches AC plus 6 inches jack size,
 for 8 inches total lift
